snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton has said that she will decide next year whether to undertake a presidential campaign. But the Clinton operation is already quietly laying the groundwork for a candidacy.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton has said publicly that she will decide early next year whether she will undertake a second campaign for the presidency, but inside the Clinton operation, the groundwork is already quietly being laid for a candidacy; lately, when supporters wish her good luck in 2016 presidential campaign, she simply thanks them rather than explaining that she has not yet decided whether she will run, as she did previously.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Martin contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton has said that she will decide next year whether to undertake a presidential campaign. But the Clinton operation is already quietly laying the groundwork for a candidacy.

headline.main: Clinton Silent on 2016 Bid as Campaign-Style Actions Begin to Speak Volumes
headline.print_headline: Clinton Silent on 2016 Bid as Campaign-Style Actions Begin to Speak Volumes
